title: Documentation - instructions for Debian installation does not work
body:
Issues occur on Debian 9 while following instructions from https://loudml.io/guide/en/loudml/reference/1.5/deb.html

**Repository style of installation gives following error while trying to run command** 

`sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install loudml-elastic loudml-influx`

```
Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have
requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable
distribution that some required packages have not yet been created
or been moved out of Incoming.
The following information may help to resolve the situation:

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 loudml-elastic : Depends: loudml (= 1.4.2) but 1.5.0 is to be installed
 loudml-influx : Depends: loudml (= 1.4.2) but 1.5.0 is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

**loudml-base and loudml-api packages are missing when trying to install manually**

command:
```
wget http://loudml.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/repo/deb/pool/main/l/loudml/loudml_1.4.2_all.deb
wget http://loudml.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/repo/deb/pool/main/l/loudml-influx/loudml-influx_1.4.2_all.deb
wget http://loudml.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/repo/deb/pool/main/l/loudml-elastic/loudml-elastic_1.4.2_all.deb
sudo dpkg -i loudml_1.4.2_all.deb loudml-influx_1.4.2_all.deb loudml-elastic_1.4.2_all.deb
```

returns:
```
root@something~# sudo dpkg -i loudml_1.4.2_all.deb loudml-influx_1.4.2_all.deb loudml-elastic_1.4.2_all.deb
(Reading database ... 42189 files and directories currently installed.)
Preparing to unpack loudml_1.4.2_all.deb ...
Unpacking loudml (1.4.2) over (1.4.2) ...
Selecting previously unselected package loudml-influx.
Preparing to unpack loudml-influx_1.4.2_all.deb ...
Unpacking loudml-influx (1.4.2) ...
Selecting previously unselected package loudml-elastic.
Preparing to unpack loudml-elastic_1.4.2_all.deb ...
Unpacking loudml-elastic (1.4.2) ...
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of loudml:
 loudml depends on loudml-base (= 1.4.2); however:
  Package loudml-base is not installed.
 loudml depends on loudml-api (>= 1.4.0); however:
  Package loudml-api is not installed.

dpkg: error processing package loudml (--install):
 dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of loudml-influx:
 loudml-influx depends on loudml (= 1.4.2); however:
  Package loudml is not configured yet.

dpkg: error processing package loudml-influx (--install):
 dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of loudml-elastic:
 loudml-elastic depends on loudml (= 1.4.2); however:
  Package loudml is not configured yet.

dpkg: error processing package loudml-elastic (--install):
 dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
Errors were encountered while processing:
 loudml
 loudml-influx
 loudml-elastic
```
